Question: Aurora Labs CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aurora Labs

Auto Update

- Uses AI to identify changes in vehicle source code and integrate into the software developer’s toolchain
- Enables six times smaller update files than current OTA solutions
- Reduces hardware memory requirements by 50%
- Provides seamless in-vehicle updates with zero downtime
- Offers 3-Diff additive update files for OTA updates
- Analyzes changes in source code and automatically creates additive update files
- Reduces the size of update files for large ECUs by 97%
- Enables up to 20 updates to be written to the existing flash memory without requiring a single erase
- Utilizes the vehicle’s power to execute the write, without discharging the battery
- Allows for instant roll-back to any version in case of an error, security incident, or recall

For more information, visit: https://www.auroralabs.com/product/auto-update/
Summary_cn:
奥罗拉实验室

自动更新

- 使用人工智能识别车辆源代码的变化，并集成到软件开发者的工具链中
- 可以比当前的OTA解决方案生成六倍更小的更新文件
- 将硬件内存要求减少50%
- 提供无停机时间的车内更新
- 提供3-Diff增量更新文件用于OTA更新
- 分析源代码的变化，并自动生成增量更新文件
- 将大型ECU的更新文件大小减少97%
- 可在现有闪存存储器上连续写入最多20个更新，而无需擦除
- 利用车辆的电源执行写入操作，无需消耗电池电量
- 在出现错误、安全事件或召回时允许即时回滚到任何版本

了解更多信息，请访问：https://www.auroralabs.com/product/auto-update/
